citation.article-title: Polynucleobacter necessarius gen. nov., sp. nov., an obligately endosymbiontic bacterium living in the cytoplasm of Euplotes aediculatus.

p.s: Polynucleobacter (pol.y.nucâ€™leo.bac.ter.; Gr. polys, numerous; masc. L. nucleus, nut, kernel; bacter, the masc. equivalent of the Gr. neut. n. bactrum, a rod)
Inhabit the cytoplasm of the following closely related Euplotes spp.: E. aediculatus, E. eurystomus, E. plumipes, E. daidaleos, E. octocarinatus, E. patella, and E. woodrufi.
The type species is Polynucleobacter necessarius.
